divs: Sighting Detailswe were driving down hyw 51 south not far from springtown tx.twards weatherford the land has rolling hills,I looked to the east there was a massive object in the sky prob. a footballfield covered with lights.I am a retired Navy combat veteran and have been around aircraft all my life,actually my dad is a retired eastern pilot who has also seen ufos.Anyway moving at a very slow speed aproaching the highway.Almost exactly like Stevenville,there was no noise.A object that large needs lift,by our propultion standards,there were no engines.Moving at prob 10 mph.I tried to get my wife to pull the car over but she was terrified.It crossed the road behind us.I tried to call you folks after seeing your add in ft worth paper and nobody called back or i just missed it. I now have no doubt in my mind that we are not alone.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Springtown
There was one other sighting in Springtown on or around July 20th 2007
Summary: Huge very wide and long MANY bright lites
